sentences.en: He based his conclusions on the evidence given by the captured prisoners.
sentences.cn: 他根据被俘囚犯提供的证据得出了这个结论。

sentences.en: He was yesterday given bail by South Yorkshire magistrates.
sentences.cn: 昨天南约克郡法院准予他获得保释。

sentences.en: His 50 years of experience have given him strong convictions about style.
sentences.cn: 50年的经验使得他在款式上有自己的独到见解。

sentences.en: I looked at what he'd given me and did a quick subtraction.
sentences.cn: 我看着他给我的东西，快速做了个减法。

sentences.en: If he is caught again he will be given a custodial sentence.
sentences.cn: 如果他再次被捕，将会被处以监禁。

sentences.en: Mr Mandela was given a tumultuous reception in Washington.
sentences.cn: 曼德拉先生在华盛顿受到热情的款待。

sentences.en: On any given day in the Houston area, half the hospital beds are empty.
sentences.cn: 在休斯敦地区，任何一天医院的床位都有一半是空的。

sentences.en: Over a given period, the value of shares will rise and fall.
sentences.cn: 股票的价值在某一特定的时期内会有涨跌。

sentences.en: Some thought must be given to the method of validation.
sentences.cn: 一些想法必须通过验证法加以证实。

sentences.en: The earlier the treatment is given, the better the patient's chances.
sentences.cn: 病人越早接受治疗，康复的可能性就越大。

sentences.en: The heavyweight champion will be given a shot at Holyfield's world title.
sentences.cn: 这名重量级拳击冠军将尝试挑战霍利菲尔德的世界冠军头衔。

sentences.en: The King has merely given the politicians enough rope to hang themselves.
sentences.cn: 国王只不过是给了这些政客自缚的绳子。

sentences.en: The rules are to be followed in any given situation.
sentences.cn: 这些规则在任何情况下都要遵守。

sentences.en: The Secretary of State has given in to special pleading.
sentences.cn: 国务卿已被那些诡辩之词给说服了。

sentences.en: The team was given a roasting by manager Alex Feguson.
sentences.cn: 这个团队遭到了亚历克斯·费格森经理的严厉批评。

sentences.en: They have been given college scholarships purely on athletic ability.
sentences.cn: 他们完全是凭体育特长才获得了大学奖学金。

sentences.en: You've given a whole list of names and addresses at the back.
sentences.cn: 你已经在末尾完整地列出了名字和地址。

words.tran_cn: 给；赠送（give的ing形式）；付出；产生
捐赠；面向；有弹性；气候转暖

trans.tran_en: any particular time, situation, amount etc that is being used as an example

trans.tran_cn: 考虑到，鉴于，如果有（机会等）
